title: Smart Mirror
detail: The smartest mirror this side of the Mississippi
extended_details: The Smart Mirror will allow users to personalize their news, music, calendar, and social media feed with gestures and voice control.  Information is displayed and updated seamlessly in an overlay, and auxiliary peripherals are bundled together in a clean, all-in-one package.
